entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -15.2°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
